translations.translation: when the baby girl buried alive is asked
And the little girl buried alive is asked
and when the girl-child buried alive shall be asked:
questions are asked about the baby girls buried alive,
And when the girl-child who was buried alive is asked.
And when the female infant (Al-Maw'udah) buried alive is questioned (Su'ilat):
And when the female infant buried alive is asked
when the buried infant shall be asked
And when the girl-child that was buried alive is asked
and when the female infant buried alive is asked
And when the girl buried alive shall be asked:
when the girl buried-alive will be asked
When the female (infant), buried alive, is questioned -
And when the female (infant) buried alive (as the pagan Arabs used to do) shall be questioned.
when the buried female infant is asked
When the girl, buried alive, is asked:
And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
[81:8] and when the girl buried-alive, the young girl buried alive for fear of shame and impoverishment, asks — in rebuke of its slayer —
(And when the girl child that was buried alive is asked) i.e. when she asks her father

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ } معناه المدفونةُ حَيةً

translations.translation: And when the buried is asked { } its meaning is the living
